item.title: My Eyes, My Father
item.description:
He died before my eyes, my father
I lived on before his eyes, his son
Two lifetimes too short together
Two futures forever undone

item.title: escape me
item.description:
Escape me from this world
And take me to another
Where you and I are free
To redefine each other

item.title: escape me for calvin klein
item.description:
ESCAPE ME for Calvin Klein is concept ad using my original IN YOUR ARMS blurb (seen here). When I was writing this blurb, each time I read it, “Calvin Klein” whispered its way to the end of the verse: it’s a beautiful blurb and a befitting brand.

#iWantToWriteForCK

item.title: in your arms
item.description:
In your arms, I am free
In your arms, we are we
In your arms, I can reach the sky
In your arms, he is I

item.title: in your eyes: blurbsmith for ray ban
item.description:
IN YOUR EYES is concept ad for Ray Ban, adapted from my original IN YOUR ARMS blurb (seen here). Ray Ban if you’re reading this, I love your brand, and would love to write some more.

#iWantToWriteForRayBan

item.title: he is human
item.description:
They changed the books, not history
They took his name out, not away
He always knew what we never wanted to…
HE IS HUMAN

item.title: he is human: blurbsmith for lance armstrong
stop and stand
item.description:
I like to stop and stand and watch the world…
it’s a comforting reminder of my own insignificance.

item.title: stop and stand & unsplash
the past
item.description: The past is the past, unless you’re the same person in the present. Then your past is your future too, and you’re fucked.

item.title: more betsys
item.description:
It’s not that the world needs less Lance Armstrongs…
It’s that the world needs more Betsy Andreas.

item.title: slowly we
item.description:
Never have I dared to be so me
Forever have I dreamed that you could be
Together is our dance, slowly we

item.title: I See
item.description:
If it were just the way she walked away
I’d swear she didn’t care
But each time we meet
I see her eyes
I see her love still there

item.title: serenade
item.description:
You serenade me asleep
And you serenade me awake
Your rhythm makes my heart beat
Your whispers, my heart ache
